item.title: Learning R: My path to banging my head against a wall in the company of others instead of alone in my office
item.description: In October 2016, I came across this post and felt a small surge of excitement. A group of women with a shared mission of learning and exchanging R-based skills together. Learning R Preface: This started out as an attempt to reflect on our first year of R-Ladies, London Ontario. What began as an opening sentence to set the context of why I pursued it in the first place accidently exploded (potato-in-microwave-style) into its own post.
